   16: -module(mam_SUITE).
   17: %% CT callbacks
   18: -export([all/0,
   19:          groups/0,
   20:          suite/0,
   21:          init_per_suite/1,
   22:          end_per_suite/1,
   23:          init_per_group/2,
   24:          end_per_group/2,
   25:          init_per_testcase/2,
   26:          end_per_testcase/2]).
   27: 
   28: %% Tests
   29: -export([mam_service_discovery/1,
   30:          muc_service_discovery/1,
   31:          simple_archive_request/1,
   32:          muc_archive_request/1,
   33:          muc_archive_purge/1,
   34:          muc_multiple_devices/1,
   35:          muc_private_message/1,
   36:          range_archive_request/1,
   37:          range_archive_request_not_empty/1,
   38:          limit_archive_request/1,
   39:          prefs_set_request/1,
   40:          prefs_set_cdata_request/1,
   41:          pagination_first5/1,
   42:          pagination_last5/1,
   43:          pagination_before10/1,
   44:          pagination_after10/1,
   45:          pagination_simple_before10/1,
   46:          pagination_last_after_id5/1,
   47:          pagination_last_after_id5_before_id11/1,
   48:          pagination_empty_rset/1,
   49:          pagination_first5_opt_count/1,
   50:          pagination_first25_opt_count_all/1,
   51:          pagination_last5_opt_count/1,
   52:          pagination_last25_opt_count_all/1,
   53:          pagination_offset5_opt_count/1,
   54:          pagination_offset5_opt_count_all/1,
   55:          archived/1,
   56:          strip_archived/1,
   57:          filter_forwarded/1,
   58:          policy_violation/1,
   59:          offline_message/1,
   60:          purge_single_message/1,
   61:          purge_multiple_messages/1,
   62:          purge_old_single_message/1,
   63:          querying_for_all_messages_with_jid/1,
   64:          muc_querying_for_all_messages/1,
   65:          muc_querying_for_all_messages_with_jid/1,
   66:          iq_spoofing/1,
   67:          run_prefs_cases/1]).
   68: 
   69: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus.hrl").
   70: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus_xmlns.hrl").
   71: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   72: -include_lib("exml/include/exml_stream.hrl").
   73: 
   74: -define(assert_equal(E, V), (
   75:     [ct:fail("ASSERT EQUAL~n\tExpected ~p~n\tValue ~p~n", [(E), (V)])
   76:      || (E) =/= (V)]
   77:     )).
   78: 
   79: -define(assert_equal_extra(E, V, Extra), (
   80:     [ct:fail("assert_equal_extra(~s, ~s)~n\tExpected ~p~n\tValue ~p~nExtra ~p~n",
   81:              [(??E), (??V), (E), (V), (Extra)])
   82:      || (E) =/= (V)]
   83:     )).
   84: 
   85: -record(rsm_in, {
   86:         max         :: non_neg_integer() | undefined,
   87:         direction   :: before | 'after' | undefined,
   88:         id          :: binary() | undefined,
   89:         index       :: non_neg_integer() | undefined,
   90:         after_id    :: binary() | undefined,
   91:         before_id   :: binary() | undefined,
   92:         from_id     :: binary() | undefined,
   93:         to_id       :: binary() | undefined,
   94:         simple = false :: boolean(),
   95:         opt_count = false :: boolean()
   96:         }).
   97: 
   98: -record(forwarded_message, {
   99:     from           :: binary() | undefined,
  100:     to             :: binary() | undefined,
  101:     result_queryid :: binary() | undefined,
  102:     result_id      :: binary() | undefined,
  103:     delay_from     :: binary() | undefined,
  104:     delay_stamp    :: binary() | undefined,
  105:     message_to     :: binary() | undefined,
  106:     message_type   :: binary() | undefined,
  107:     message_body   :: binary() | undefined
  108: }).
  109: 
  110: -record(result_iq, {
  111:     from            :: binary(),
  112:     to              :: binary(),
  113:     id              :: binary(),
  114:     first           :: binary() | undefined,
  115:     first_index     :: non_neg_integer() | undefined,
  116:     last            :: binary() | undefined,
  117:     count           :: non_neg_integer()
  118: }).
  119: 
  120: -record(error_iq, {
  121:     id              :: binary(),
  122:     type            :: binary(),
  123:     error_type      :: binary(),
  124:     condition       :: binary(),
  125:     text            :: binary()
  126: }).
  127: 
  128: -record(prefs_result_iq, {
  129:     default_mode    :: binary() | undefined,
  130:     always_jids = [] :: [binary()],
  131:     never_jids  = [] :: [binary()]
  132: }).
  133: 
  134: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  135: %% Suite configuration
  136: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  137: 
  138: muc_host() ->
  139:     <<"muc.localhost">>.
  140: 
  141: host() ->
  142:     <<"localhost">>.
  143: 
  144: configurations() ->
  145:     odbc_configs(is_odbc_enabled(host()))
  146:     ++ riak_configs(is_riak_enabled(host())).
  147: 
  148: odbc_configs(true) ->
  149:     [odbc,
  150:      odbc_async_pool,
  151:      odbc_mnesia,
  152:      odbc_async_cache,
  153:      odbc_cache,
  154:      odbc_mnesia_cache,
  155:      odbc_mnesia_muc_cache];
  156: odbc_configs(_) ->
  157:     [].
  158: 
  159: riak_configs(true) ->
  160:      [riak_timed_yz_buckets];
  161: riak_configs(_) ->
  162:      [].
  163: 
  164: basic_group_names() ->
  165:     [
  166:     mam,
  167:     mam_purge,
  168:     muc,
  169:     muc_with_pm,
  170:     rsm,
  171:     with_rsm,
  172:     muc_rsm,
  173:     bootstrapped,
  174:     archived,
  175:     policy_violation,
  176:     offline_message,
  177:     prefs_cases
  178:     ].
  179: 
  180: all() ->
  181:     Reasons =
  182:     case is_mam_possible(host())  of
  183:         false -> [require_odbc];
  184:         true  -> []
  185:     end,
  186:     case Reasons of
  187:         [] ->
  188:             tests();
  189:         [_|_] ->
  190:             {skip, Reasons}
  191:     end.
  192: 
  193: tests() ->
  194:     [{group, full_group(C, G)}
  195:      || C <- configurations(), G <- basic_group_names(),
  196:         not is_skipped(C, G)].
  197: 
  198: groups() ->
  199:     [{full_group(C, G), Props, Tests}
  200:      || C <- configurations(), {G, Props, Tests} <- basic_groups(),
  201:         not is_skipped(C, G)].
  202: 
  203: is_skipped(_, _) ->
  204:     false.
  205: 
  206: 
  207: basic_groups() ->
  208:     [{bootstrapped,     [], bootstrapped_cases()},
  209:      {mam,              [], mam_cases()},
  210:      {mam_purge,        [], mam_purge_cases()},
  211:      {archived,         [], archived_cases()},
  212:      {policy_violation, [], policy_violation_cases()},
  213:      {offline_message,  [], offline_message_cases()},
  214:      {muc,              [], muc_cases()},
  215:      {muc_with_pm,      [], muc_cases()},
  216:      {rsm,              [], rsm_cases()},
  217:      {muc_rsm,          [], muc_rsm_cases()},
  218:      {with_rsm,         [], with_rsm_cases()},
  219:      {prefs_cases,      [], [run_prefs_cases]}].
  220: 
  221: bootstrapped_cases() ->
  222:      [purge_old_single_message,
  223:       querying_for_all_messages_with_jid].
  224: 
  225: mam_cases() ->
  226:     [mam_service_discovery,
  227:      simple_archive_request,
  228:      range_archive_request,
  229:      range_archive_request_not_empty,
  230:      limit_archive_request,
  231:      prefs_set_request,
  232:      prefs_set_cdata_request,
  233:      iq_spoofing].
  234: 
  235: mam_purge_cases() ->
  236:     [purge_single_message,
  237:      purge_multiple_messages].
  238: 
  239: archived_cases() ->
  240:     [archived,
  241:      strip_archived,
  242:      filter_forwarded].
  243: 
  244: policy_violation_cases() ->
  245:     [policy_violation].
  246: 
  247: offline_message_cases() ->
  248:     [offline_message].
  249: 
  250: muc_cases() ->
  251:     [muc_service_discovery,
  252:      muc_archive_request,
  253:      muc_archive_purge,
  254:      muc_multiple_devices,
  255:      muc_private_message,
  256:      muc_querying_for_all_messages,
  257:      muc_querying_for_all_messages_with_jid
  258:      ].
  259: 
  260: muc_rsm_cases() ->
  261:     rsm_cases().
  262: 
  263: with_rsm_cases() ->
  264:     rsm_cases().
  265: 
  266: rsm_cases() ->
  267:       [pagination_first5,
  268:        pagination_last5,
  269:        pagination_before10,
  270:        pagination_after10,
  271:        pagination_empty_rset,
  272:        %% Border cases
  273:        pagination_last_after_id5,
  274:        pagination_last_after_id5_before_id11,
  275:        %% Simple cases
  276:        pagination_simple_before10,
  277:        %% opt_count cases
  278:        pagination_first5_opt_count,
  279:        pagination_last5_opt_count,
  280:        pagination_offset5_opt_count,
  281:        %% opt_count cases with all messages on the page
  282:        pagination_first25_opt_count_all,
  283:        pagination_last25_opt_count_all,
  284:        pagination_offset5_opt_count_all].
  285: 
  286: suite() ->
  287:     escalus:suite().
  288: 
  289: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  290:     [{escalus_user_db, {module, escalus_ejabberd}}
  291:      | escalus:init_per_suite(Config)].
  292: 
  293: end_per_suite(Config) ->
  294:     escalus:end_per_suite(Config).
  295: 
  296: user_names() ->
  297:     [alice, bob, kate].
  298: 
  299: create_users(Config) ->
  300:     escalus:create_users(Config, {by_name, user_names()}).
  301: 
  302: delete_users(Config) ->
  303:     escalus:delete_users(Config, {by_name, user_names()}).
  304: 
  305: init_per_group(Group, ConfigIn) ->
  306:    C = configuration(Group),
  307:    B = basic_group(Group),
  308:    case init_modules(C, B, ConfigIn) of
  309:         skip ->
  310:             {skip, {init_modules, C, B, ConfigIn}};
  311:         Config0 ->
  312:             ct:pal("Init per group ~p; configuration ~p; basic group ~p",
  313:                    [Group, C, B]),
  314:             Config1 = do_init_per_group(C, Config0),
  315:             [{basic_group, B}, {configuration, C} | init_state(C, B, Config1)]
  316:     end.
  317: 
  318: do_init_per_group(C, ConfigIn) ->
  319:     Config0 = create_users(ConfigIn),
  320:     case C of
  321:         riak_timed_yz_buckets ->
  322:             [{yz_wait, 2500} | Config0];
  323:         _ ->
  324:             Config0
  325:     end.
  326: 
  327: end_per_group(Group, Config) ->
  328:     delete_users(Config),
  329:     C = configuration(Group),
  330:     B = basic_group(Group),
  331:     end_modules(C, B, Config).
  332: 
  333: init_modules(C, muc_rsm, Config) ->
  334:     init_modules(C, muc, Config);
  335: 
  336: init_modules(ca, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  337:     %% TODO add mod_mam with Cassandra
  338:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_ca_arch, []),
  339:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  340:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  341:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  342:     Config;
  343: init_modules(odbc, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  344:     %% TODO test both mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch and mod_mam_odbc_arch
  345:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [muc, pm]),
  346:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  347:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  348:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  349:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  350:     Config;
  351: init_modules(odbc_async_pool, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  352:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, [no_writer]),
  353:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_async_pool_writer, []),
  354:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [no_writer, pm]),
  355:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_async_pool_writer, [pm]),
  356:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  357:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  358:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  359:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  360:     Config;
  361: init_modules(odbc_mnesia, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  362:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  363:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  364:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  365:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  366:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  367:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  368:     Config;
  369: init_modules(odbc_cache, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  370:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  371:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  372:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  373:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  374:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [muc, pm]),
  375:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  376:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  377:     Config;
  378: init_modules(odbc_async_cache, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  379:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, [no_writer]),
  380:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_async_pool_writer, []),
  381:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [no_writer, pm]),
  382:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_async_pool_writer, [pm]),
  383:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  384:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  385:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [muc, pm]),
  386:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  387:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  388:     Config;
  389: init_modules(odbc_mnesia_muc_cache, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  390:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  391:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  392:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  393:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  394:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [pm]),
  395:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_cache_user, []),
  396:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  397:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  398:     Config;
  399: init_modules(odbc_mnesia_cache, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  400:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  401:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  402:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  403:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  404:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [muc, pm]),
  405:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  406:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  407:     Config;
  408: 
  409: init_modules(ca, muc, Config) ->
  410:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_ca_arch, []),
  411:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  412:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  413:     Config;
  414: init_modules(odbc, muc, Config) ->
  415:     %% TODO test both mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch and mod_mam_odbc_arch
  416:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [muc]),
  417:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc]),
  418:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  419:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  420:     Config;
  421: init_modules(odbc_async_pool, muc, Config) ->
  422:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, [no_writer]),
  423:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_async_pool_writer, []),
  424:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc]),
  425:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  426:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  427:     Config;
  428: init_modules(odbc_mnesia, muc, Config) ->
  429:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  430:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [muc]),
  431:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  432:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  433:     Config;
  434: init_modules(odbc_cache, muc, Config) ->
  435:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  436:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc]),
  437:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  438:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [muc]),
  439:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  440:     Config;
  441: init_modules(odbc_async_cache, muc, Config) ->
  442:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, [no_writer]),
  443:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_async_pool_writer, []),
  444:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc]),
  445:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  446:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [muc]),
  447:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  448:     Config;
  449: init_modules(odbc_mnesia_muc_cache, muc, Config) ->
  450:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  451:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [muc]),
  452:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  453:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_cache_user, [muc]),
  454:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  455:     Config;
  456: init_modules(odbc_mnesia_cache, muc, Config) ->
  457:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  458:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [muc]),
  459:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  460:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [muc]),
  461:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  462:     Config;
  463: init_modules(odbc, _, Config) ->
  464:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  465:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  466:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [pm]),
  467:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  468:     Config;
  469: init_modules(ca, _, Config) ->
  470:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_con_ca_arch, [pm]),
  471:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [pm]),
  472:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  473:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  474:     Config;
  475: init_modules(odbc_async, _, Config) ->
  476:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  477:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm, no_writer]),
  478:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_async_writer, [pm]),
  479:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [pm]),
  480:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  481:     Config;
  482: init_modules(riak_timed_yz_buckets, _, Config) ->
  483:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_riak_timed_arch_yz, [pm, muc]),
  484:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  485:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  486:     Config;
  487: init_modules(odbc_async_pool, _, Config) ->
  488:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  489:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm, no_writer]),
  490:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_async_pool_writer, [pm]),
  491:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [pm]),
  492:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  493:     Config;
  494: init_modules(odbc_mnesia, _, Config) ->
  495:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  496:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  497:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [pm]),
  498:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  499:     Config;
  500: init_modules(odbc_cache, _, Config) ->
  501:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  502:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  503:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [pm]),
  504:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  505:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [pm]),
  506:     Config;
  507: init_modules(odbc_async_cache, _, Config) ->
  508:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  509:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm, no_writer]),
  510:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_async_pool_writer, [pm]),
  511:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [pm]),
  512:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  513:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [pm]),
  514:     Config;
  515: init_modules(odbc_mnesia_muc_cache, _, _Config) ->
  516:     skip;
  517: init_modules(odbc_mnesia_cache, _, Config) ->
  518:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  519:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  520:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [pm]),
  521:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  522:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [pm]),
  523:     Config.
  524: 
  525: end_modules(_, _, Config) ->
  526:     [stop_module(host(), M) || M <- mam_modules()],
  527:     Config.
  528: 
  529: mam_modules() ->
  530:     [mod_mam,
  531:      mod_mam_muc,
  532:      mod_mam_con_ca_arch,
  533:      mod_mam_ca_arch,
  534:      mod_mam_muc_ca_arch,
  535:      mod_mam_odbc_arch,
  536:      mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch,
  537:      mod_mam_con_ca,
  538:      mod_mam_odbc_async_pool_writer,
  539:      mod_mam_muc_odbc_async_pool_writer,
  540:      mod_mam_odbc_prefs,
  541:      mod_mam_mnesia_prefs,
  542:      mod_mam_mnesia_dirty_prefs,
  543:      mod_mam_odbc_user,
  544:      mod_mam_cache_user,
  545:      mod_mam_muc_cache_user,
  546:      mod_mam_riak_timed_arch_yz].
  547: 
  548: init_state(_, muc_rsm, Config) ->
  549:     Config1 = start_alice_room(Config),
  550:     Config2 = clean_room_archive(Config1),
  551:     Config3 = send_muc_rsm_messages(Config2),
  552:     [{muc_rsm, true} | Config3];
  553: init_state(_, muc, Config) ->
  554:     Config;
  555: init_state(_, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  556:     Config;
  557: init_state(_, rsm, Config) ->
  558:     send_rsm_messages(clean_archives(Config));
  559: init_state(_, with_rsm, Config) ->
  560:     Config1 = [{with_rsm, true}|Config],
  561:     send_rsm_messages(clean_archives(Config1));
  562: init_state(_, run_prefs_cases, Config) ->
  563:     clean_archives(Config);
  564: init_state(_, _, Config) ->
  565:     clean_archives(Config).
  566: 
  567: 
  568: init_per_testcase(C=archived, ConfigIn) ->
  569:     Config = case ?config(configuration, ConfigIn) of
  570:                  odbc_async_pool ->
  571:                      MongooseMetrics = [
  572:                                         {[data, odbc, mam_async],
  573:                                          [{recv_oct, '>'}, {send_oct, '>'}]}
  574:                                        ],
  575:                      [{mongoose_metrics, MongooseMetrics} | ConfigIn];
  576:                  _ ->
  577:                      ConfigIn
  578:              end,
  579:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_archives(Config));
  580: init_per_testcase(C=strip_archived, Config) ->
  581:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_archives(Config));
  582: init_per_testcase(C=filter_forwarded, Config) ->
  583:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_archives(Config));
  584: init_per_testcase(C=purge_single_message, Config) ->
  585:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_archives(Config));
  586: init_per_testcase(C=purge_multiple_messages, Config) ->
  587:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_archives(Config));
  588: init_per_testcase(C=purge_old_single_message, Config) ->
  589:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C,
  590:         bootstrap_archive(clean_archives(Config)));
  591: init_per_testcase(C=querying_for_all_messages_with_jid, Config) ->
  592:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C,
  593:         bootstrap_archive(clean_archives(Config)));
  594: init_per_testcase(C=offline_message, Config) ->
  595:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C,
  596:         bootstrap_archive(clean_archives(Config)));
  597: init_per_testcase(C=muc_querying_for_all_messages, Config) ->
  598:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C,
  599:         muc_bootstrap_archive(start_alice_room(Config)));
  600: init_per_testcase(C=muc_querying_for_all_messages_with_jid, Config) ->
  601:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C,
  602:         muc_bootstrap_archive(start_alice_room(Config)));
  603: init_per_testcase(C=muc_archive_request, Config) ->
  604:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_room_archive(start_alice_room(Config)));
  605: init_per_testcase(C=muc_archive_purge, Config) ->
  606:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_room_archive(start_alice_room(Config)));
  607: init_per_testcase(C=muc_multiple_devices, Config) ->
  608:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_room_archive(start_alice_room(Config)));
  609: init_per_testcase(C=muc_private_message, Config) ->
  610:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, start_alice_room(Config));
  611: init_per_testcase(C=range_archive_request_not_empty, Config) ->
  612:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C,
  613:         bootstrap_archive(clean_archives(Config)));
  614: init_per_testcase(C=prefs_set_request, Config) ->
  615:     skip_if_riak(C, Config);
  616: init_per_testcase(C=prefs_set_cdata_request, Config) ->
  617:     skip_if_riak(C, Config);
  618: init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
  619:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
  620: 
  621: skip_if_riak(C, Config) ->
  622:     case ?config(configuration, Config) of
  623:         riak_timed_yz_buckets ->
  624:             {skip, "prefs not implemented for riak"};
  625:         _ ->
  626:             escalus:init_per_testcase(C, Config)
  627:     end.
  628: 
  629: end_per_testcase(C=muc_archive_request, Config) ->
  630:     destroy_room(Config),
  631:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  632: end_per_testcase(C=muc_archive_purge, Config) ->
  633:     destroy_room(Config),
  634:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  635: end_per_testcase(C=muc_multiple_devices, Config) ->
  636:     destroy_room(Config),
  637:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  638: end_per_testcase(C=muc_private_message, Config) ->
  639:     destroy_room(Config),
  640:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  641: end_per_testcase(C=muc_querying_for_all_messages, Config) ->
  642:     destroy_room(Config),
  643:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  644: end_per_testcase(C=muc_querying_for_all_messages_with_jid, Config) ->
  645:     destroy_room(Config),
  646:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  647: end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
  648:     escalus:end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
  649: 
  650: init_module(Host, Mod, Args) ->
  651:     lists:member(Mod, mam_modules())
  652:     orelse
  653:     ct:fail("Unknown module ~p", [Mod]),
  654:     stop_module(Host, Mod),
  655:     ok = start_module(Host, Mod, Args).
  656: 
  657: is_loaded_module(Host, Mod) ->
  658:     rpc_apply(gen_mod, is_loaded, [Host, Mod]).
  659: 
  660: start_module(Host, Mod, Args) ->
  661:     rpc_apply(gen_mod, start_module, [Host, Mod, Args]).
  662: 
  663: stop_module(Host, Mod) ->
  664:     case is_loaded_module(Host, Mod) of
  665:         non_existing -> ok;
  666:         false        -> ok;
  667:         true         -> just_stop_module(Host, Mod)
  668:     end.
  669: 
  670: just_stop_module(Host, Mod) ->
  671:     {atomic, ok} = rpc_apply(gen_mod, stop_module, [Host, Mod]),
  672:     ok.
  673: 
  674: rpc_apply(M, F, Args) ->
  675:     case rpc_call(M, F, Args) of
  676:     {badrpc, Reason} ->
  677:         ct:fail("~p:~p/~p with arguments ~w fails with reason ~p.",
  678:                 [M, F, length(Args), Args, Reason]);
  679:     Result ->
  680:         Result
  681:     end.
  682: 
  683: rpc_call(M, F, A) ->
  684:     Node = escalus_ct:get_config(ejabberd_node),
  685:     Cookie = escalus_ct:get_config(ejabberd_cookie),
  686:     escalus_ct:rpc_call(Node, M, F, A, 10000, Cookie).
  687: 
  688: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  689: %% Group name helpers
  690: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  691: 
  692: full_group(Conf, Group) ->
  693:     list_to_atom(atom_to_list(Conf) ++ "_" ++ atom_to_list(Group)).
  694: 
  695: %% @doc Delete suffix.
  696: configuration(Group) ->
  697:     match_atom_prefix(Group, make_greedy(configurations())).
  698: 
  699: %% @doc Rearrange a list of strings (or atoms), that all prefixes
  700: %% will be tested.
  701: %%
  702: %% Example:
  703: %% `make_greedy(odbc_mnesia_muc, [odbc, odbc_mnesia]) -> odbc'
  704: %% `make_greedy(odbc_mnesia_muc, match_longer_first([odbc, odbc_mnesia])) -> odbc_mnesia'
  705: %% @end
  706: make_greedy(List) ->
  707:     lists:reverse(lists:usort(List)).
  708: 
  709: %% @doc Delete prefix.
  710: basic_group(Group) ->
  711:     basic_group(Group, configuration(Group)).
  712: 
  713: basic_group(Group, Conf) ->
  714:     ConfS = atom_to_list(Conf),
  715:     GroupS = atom_to_list(Group),
  716:     list_to_atom(delete_delimiter(delete_prefix(ConfS, GroupS))).
  717: 
  718: match_atom_prefix(Target, Prefixes) ->
  719:     match_atom_prefix_1(atom_to_list(Target), Prefixes).
  720: 
  721: match_atom_prefix_1(TargetS, [PrefixA|Prefixes]) ->
  722:     PrefixS = atom_to_list(PrefixA),
  723:     case lists:prefix(PrefixS, TargetS) of
  724:         true -> PrefixA;
  725:         false -> match_atom_prefix_1(TargetS, Prefixes)
  726:     end.
  727: 
  728: delete_prefix([H|Prefix], [H|Target]) ->
  729:     delete_prefix(Prefix, Target);
  730: delete_prefix([], Target) ->
  731:     Target.
  732: 
  733: delete_delimiter("_" ++ Tail) ->
  734:     Tail.
  735: 
  736: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  737: %% Adhoc tests
  738: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  739: 
  740: %% Querying the archive for messages
  741: simple_archive_request(ConfigIn) ->
  742:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  743:         %% Alice sends "OH, HAI!" to Bob
  744:         %% {xmlel,<<"message">>,
  745:         %%  [{<<"from">>,<<"alice@localhost/res1">>},
  746:         %%   {<<"to">>,<<"bob@localhost/res1">>},
  747:         %%   {<<"xml:lang">>,<<"en">>},
  748:         %%   {<<"type">>,<<"chat">>}],
  749:         %%   [{xmlel,<<"body">>,[],[{xmlcdata,<<"OH, HAI!">>}]}]}
  750:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"OH, HAI!">>)),
  751:         maybe_wait_for_yz(ConfigIn),
  752:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_archive_request(<<"q1">>)),
  753:         assert_respond_size(1, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Alice)),
  754:         ok
  755:         end,
  756:     MongooseMetrics = [{[backends, mod_mam, archive], changed},
  757:                        {[backends, mod_mam, lookup], changed}
  758:                       ],
  759:     Config = [{mongoose_metrics, MongooseMetrics} | ConfigIn],
  760:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
  761: 
  762: querying_for_all_messages_with_jid(Config) ->
  763:     F = fun(Alice) ->
  764:         Pregenerated = ?config(pre_generated_msgs, Config),
  765:         BWithJID = nick_to_jid(bob, Config),
  766: 
  767:         WithBob = [1 || {_, _, {JID, _, _}, _, _} <- Pregenerated, JID == BWithJID],
  768: 
  769:         CountWithBob = lists:sum(WithBob),
  770:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_filtered_by_jid_request(BWithJID)),
  771:         assert_respond_size(CountWithBob, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Alice)),
  772:         ok
  773:         end,
  774:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
  775: 
  776: muc_querying_for_all_messages(Config) ->
  777:     F = fun(Alice) ->
  778:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
  779:         MucMsgs = ?config(pre_generated_muc_msgs, Config),
  780: 
  781:         MucArchiveLen = length(MucMsgs),
  782: 
  783:         IQ = stanza_archive_request(<<>>),
  784:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_to_room(IQ, Room)),
  785:         assert_respond_size(MucArchiveLen, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Alice)),
  786: 
  787:         ok
  788:         end,
  789:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
  790: 
  791: muc_querying_for_all_messages_with_jid(Config) ->
  792:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  793:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
  794:         BWithJID = room_address(Room, nick(Bob)),
  795: 
  796:         MucMsgs = ?config(pre_generated_muc_msgs, Config),
  797:         WithJID = [1 || {_, _, {JID, _, _}, _, _} <- MucMsgs, JID == BWithJID],
  798:         Len = lists:sum(WithJID),
  799: 
  800:         IQ = stanza_filtered_by_jid_request(BWithJID),
  801:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_to_room(IQ, Room)),
  802:         Result = wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Alice),
  803: 
  804:         assert_respond_size(Len, Result),
  805:         ok
  806:         end,
  807:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
  808: 
  809: archived(Config) ->
  810:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  811:         %% Archive must be empty.
  812:         %% Alice sends "OH, HAI!" to Bob.
  813:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"OH, HAI!">>)),
  814: 
  815:         %% Bob receives a message.
  816:         Msg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  817:         try
  818:         Arc = exml_query:subelement(Msg, <<"archived">>),
  819:         %% JID of the archive (i.e. where the client would send queries to)
  820:         By  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"by">>),
  821:         %% Attribute giving the message's UID within the archive.
  822:         Id  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"id">>),
  823: 
  824:         ?assert_equal(By, escalus_client:short_jid(Bob)),
  825: 
  826:         %% Bob calls archive.
  827:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
  828:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_archive_request(<<"q1">>)),
  829:         [_ArcIQ, ArcMsg] = assert_respond_size(1, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Bob)),
  830:         #forwarded_message{result_id=ArcId} = parse_forwarded_message(ArcMsg),
  831:         ?assert_equal(Id, ArcId),
  832:         ok
  833:         catch Class:Reason ->
  834:             Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
  835:             ct:pal("Msg ~p", [Msg]),
  836:             erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
  837:         end
  838:         end,
  839:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
  840: 
  841: filter_forwarded(Config) ->
  842:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  843:         %% Alice sends "OH, HAI!" to Bob.
  844:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"OH, HAI!">>)),
  845: 
  846:         %% Bob receives a message.
  847:         escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  848:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
  849:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_archive_request(<<"q1">>)),
  850:         [_ArcIQ1, _ArcMsg1] = assert_respond_size(1, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Bob)),
  851: 
  852:         %% Check, that previous forwarded message was not archived.
  853:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_archive_request(<<"q2">>)),
  854:         [_ArcIQ2, _ArcMsg2] = assert_respond_size(1, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Bob)),
  855:         ok
  856:         end,
  857:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
  858: 
  859: strip_archived(Config) ->
  860:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  861:         %% Archive must be empty.
  862:         %% Alice sends "OH, HAI!" to Bob.
  863:         escalus:send(Alice,
  864:                      append_subelem(escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"OH, HAI!">>),
  865:                                     archived_elem(escalus_client:short_jid(Bob),
  866:                                                   <<"fake-id">>))),
  867: 
  868:         %% Bob receives a message.
  869:         Msg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  870:         Arc = exml_query:subelement(Msg, <<"archived">>),
  871:         %% JID of the archive (i.e. where the client would send queries to)
  872:         By  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"by">>),
  873:         %% Attribute giving the message's UID within the archive.
  874:         Id  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"id">>),
  875: 
  876:         ?assert_equal(escalus_client:short_jid(Bob), By),
  877: 
  878:         try
  879:         %% Bob calls archive.
  880:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
  881:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_archive_request(<<"q1">>)),
  882:         [_ArcIQ, ArcMsg] = assert_respond_size(1, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Bob)),
  883:         #forwarded_message{result_id=ArcId} = parse_forwarded_message(ArcMsg),
  884:         ?assert_equal(ArcId, Id),
  885:         ok
  886:         catch Class:Reason ->
  887:             Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
  888:             ct:pal("Msg ~p", [Msg]),
  889:             erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
  890:         end
  891:         end,
  892:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
  893: 
  894: wait_archive_respond_iq_first(User) ->
  895:     %% rot1
  896:     [IQ|Messages] = lists:reverse(wait_archive_respond(User)),
  897:     [IQ|lists:reverse(Messages)].
  898: 
  899: wait_archive_respond(User) ->
  900:     S = escalus:wait_for_stanza(User, 5000),
  901:     case escalus_pred:is_iq_error(S) of
  902:         true ->
  903:             ct:pal("Stanza ~p", [S]),
  904:             ct:fail("Unexpected error IQ.", []);
  905:         false -> ok
  906:     end,
  907:     case escalus_pred:is_iq_result(S) of
  908:         true  -> [S];
  909:         false -> [S|wait_archive_respond(User)]
  910:     end.
  911: 
  912: assert_respond_size(Size, Respond) when length(Respond) =:= (Size + 1) ->
  913:     Respond;
  914: assert_respond_size(ExpectedSize, Respond) ->
  915:     RespondSize = length(Respond) - 1,
  916:     ct:fail("Respond size is ~p, ~p is expected.", [RespondSize, ExpectedSize]).
  917:     %% void()
  918: 
  919: %% To conserve resources, a server MAY place a reasonable limit on how many
  920: %% stanzas may be pushed to a client in one request.
  921: %% If a query returns a number of stanzas greater than this limit and
  922: %% the client did not specify a limit using RSM then the server should
  923: %% return a policy-violation error to the client.
  924: policy_violation(Config) ->
  925:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  926:         %% Alice sends messages to Bob.
  927:         %% WARNING: are we sending too fast?
  928:         [escalus:send(Alice,
  929:                       escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, generate_message_text(N)))
  930:          || N <- lists:seq(1, 51)],
  931:         %% Bob is waiting for 51 messages for 5 seconds.
  932:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 51, 5000),
  933:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
  934:         %% Get whole history (queryid is "will_fail", id is random).
  935:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_archive_request(<<"will_fail">>)),
  936:         ErrorIQ = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice, 5000),
  937:         try
  938:             #error_iq{condition = Condition} = parse_error_iq(ErrorIQ),
  939:             ?assert_equal(<<"policy-violation">>, Condition),
  940:             ok
  941:         catch Class:Reason ->
  942:             Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
  943:             ct:pal("ErrorIQ ~p", [ErrorIQ]),
  944:             erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
  945:         end
  946:         end,
  947:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
  948: 
  949: %% Ensure, that a offline message does not stored twice when delivered.
  950: offline_message(Config) ->
  951:     Msg = <<"Is there anybody here?">>,
  952:     F = fun(Alice) ->
  953:         %% Alice sends a message to Bob while bob is offline.
  954:         escalus:send(Alice,
  955:                      escalus_stanza:chat_to(bob, Msg)),
  956:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
  957:         ok
  958:         end,
  959:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F),
  960: 
  961:     %% Bob logs in
  962:     Bob = login_send_presence(Config, bob),
  963: 
  964:     %% If mod_offline is enabled, then an offline message
  965:     %% will be delivered automatically.
  966: 
  967:     %% He receives his initial presence and the message.
  968:     escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2, 1000),
  969: 
  970:     %% Bob checks his archive.
  971:     escalus:send(Bob, stanza_archive_request(<<"q1">>)),
  972:     [_ArcRes | ArcMsgs] = R = wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Bob),
  973:     assert_only_one_of_many_is_equal(ArcMsgs, Msg),
  974: 
  975:     escalus_cleaner:clean(Config).
  976: 
  977: purge_single_message(Config) ->
  978:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  979:             escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"OH, HAI!">>)),
  980:             maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
  981:             escalus:send(Alice, stanza_archive_request(<<"q1">>)),
  982:             [_IQ, Mess] = assert_respond_size(1, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Alice)),
  983:             ParsedMess = parse_forwarded_message(Mess),
  984:             #forwarded_message{result_id=MessId} = ParsedMess,
  985:             escalus:send(Alice, stanza_purge_single_message(MessId)),
  986:             %% Waiting for ack.
  987:             escalus:assert(is_iq_result, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice, 5000)),
  988:             escalus:send(Alice, stanza_archive_request(<<"q2">>)),
  989:             assert_respond_size(0, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Alice)),
  990:             ok
  991:         end,
  992:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
  993: 
  994: purge_old_single_message(Config) ->
  995:     F = fun(Alice) ->
  996:             escalus:send(Alice, stanza_archive_request(<<"q1">>)),
  997:             Pregenderated = ?config(pre_generated_msgs, Config),
  998:             AliceArchSize = length(Pregenderated),
  999:             [_IQ|AllMessages] = assert_respond_size(AliceArchSize,
 1000:                 wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Alice)),
 1001:             ParsedMessages = [parse_forwarded_message(M) || M <- AllMessages],
 1002:             %% Delete fifth message.
 1003:             ParsedMess = lists:nth(5, ParsedMessages),
 1004:             #forwarded_message{result_id=MessId} = ParsedMess,
 1005:             escalus:send(Alice, stanza_purge_single_message(MessId)),
 1006:             %% Waiting for ack.
 1007:             escalus:assert(is_iq_result, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice, 5000)),
 1008:             %% Check, that it was deleted.
 1009:             escalus:send(Alice, stanza_archive_request(<<"q2">>)),
 1010:             assert_respond_size(AliceArchSize - 1, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Alice)),
 1011:             ok
 1012:         end,
 1013:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1014: 
 1015: purge_multiple_messages(Config) ->
 1016:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1017:             %% Alice sends messages to Bob.
 1018:             [begin
 1019:                 escalus:send(Alice,
 1020:                     escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, generate_message_text(N))),
 1021:                  timer:sleep(100)
 1022:              end || N <- lists:seq(1, 15)],
 1023:             maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1024:             %% Bob is waiting for 15 messages for 5 seconds.
 1025:             escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 15, 5000),
 1026:             %% Bob purges all messages from his archive.
 1027:             escalus:send(Bob, stanza_purge_multiple_messages(
 1028:                     undefined, undefined, undefined)),
 1029:             %% Waiting for ack.
 1030:             escalus:assert(is_iq_result, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob, 15000)),
 1031:             escalus:send(Bob, stanza_archive_request(<<"q2">>)),
 1032:             assert_respond_size(0, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Bob)),
 1033:             ok
 1034:         end,
 1035:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1036: 
 1037: muc_archive_request(Config) ->
 1038:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1039:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
 1040:         RoomAddr = room_address(Room),
 1041:         Text = <<"Hi, Bob!">>,
 1042:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Alice))),
 1043:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Bob))),
 1044: 
 1045:         %% Bob received presences.
 1046:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2),
 1047: 
 1048:         %% Bob received the room's subject.
 1049:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1),
 1050: 
 1051:         %% Alice sends to the chat room.
 1052: 		escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:groupchat_to(RoomAddr, Text)),
 1053: 
 1054:         %% Bob received the message "Hi, Bob!".
 1055:         %% This message will be archived (by alicesroom@localhost).
 1056:         %% User's archive is disabled (i.e. bob@localhost).
 1057:         BobMsg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1058:         escalus:assert(is_message, BobMsg),
 1059:         Arc = exml_query:subelement(BobMsg, <<"archived">>),
 1060:         %% JID of the archive (i.e. where the client would send queries to)
 1061:         By  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"by">>),
 1062:         %% Attribute giving the message's UID within the archive.
 1063:         Id  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"id">>),
 1064: 
 1065:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1066: 
 1067:         %% Bob requests the room's archive.
 1068:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_to_room(stanza_archive_request(<<"q1">>), Room)),
 1069:         [_ArcRes, ArcMsg] = assert_respond_size(1, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Bob)),
 1070:         #forwarded_message{result_id=ArcId, message_body=ArcMsgBody} =
 1071:             parse_forwarded_message(ArcMsg),
 1072:         ?assert_equal(Text, ArcMsgBody),
 1073:         ?assert_equal(ArcId, Id),
 1074:         ?assert_equal(RoomAddr, By),
 1075:         ok
 1076:         end,
 1077:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1078: %% Copied from 'muc_archive_reuest' test in case to show some bug in mod_mam_muc related to issue #512
 1079: muc_archive_purge(Config) ->
 1080:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1081:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
 1082:         RoomAddr = room_address(Room),
 1083:         Text = <<"Hi, Bob!">>,
 1084:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Alice))),
 1085:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Bob))),
 1086: 
 1087:         %% Bob received presences.
 1088:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2),
 1089: 
 1090:         %% Bob received the room's subject.
 1091:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1),
 1092: 
 1093:         %% Alice sends to the chat room.
 1094:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:groupchat_to(RoomAddr, Text)),
 1095: 
 1096:         %% Bob received the message "Hi, Bob!".
 1097:         %% This message will be archived (by alicesroom@localhost).
 1098:         %% User's archive is disabled (i.e. bob@localhost).
 1099:         BobMsg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1100:         escalus:assert(is_message, BobMsg),
 1101:         %% Flush all msgs to Alice
 1102:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 6),
 1103:         %% Alice purges the room's archive.
 1104:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_to_room(stanza_purge_multiple_messages(
 1105:            undefined, undefined, undefined), Room)),
 1106:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice)),
 1107:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1108:         ok
 1109:     end,
 1110:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1111: 
 1112: muc_multiple_devices(Config) ->
 1113:     F = fun(Alice1, Alice2, Bob) ->
 1114:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
 1115:         RoomAddr = room_address(Room),
 1116:         Text = <<"Hi, Bob!">>,
 1117:         %% You should use an unique nick for each device.
 1118:         escalus:send(Alice1, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, <<"alice_1">>)),
 1119:         escalus:send(Alice2, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, <<"alice_2">>)),
 1120:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, <<"bob">>)),
 1121: 
 1122:         %% Alice received presences.
 1123:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice1, 3),
 1124:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice2, 3),
 1125: 
 1126:         %% Bob received presences.
 1127:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 3),
 1128: 
 1129:         %% Bob received the room's subject.
 1130:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1),
 1131: 
 1132:         %% Alice received the room's subject.
 1133:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice1, 1),
 1134:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice2, 1),
 1135: 
 1136:         %% Alice sends to the chat room.
 1137: 		escalus:send(Alice1, escalus_stanza:groupchat_to(RoomAddr, Text)),
 1138: 
 1139:         %% Alice receives her own message.
 1140:         Alice1Msg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice1),
 1141:         escalus:assert(is_message, Alice1Msg),
 1142: 
 1143:         Alice2Msg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice2),
 1144:         escalus:assert(is_message, Alice2Msg),
 1145: 
 1146:         Alice1Arc = exml_query:subelement(Alice1Msg, <<"archived">>),
 1147:         Alice2Arc = exml_query:subelement(Alice2Msg, <<"archived">>),
 1148:         ?assert_equal(Alice1Arc, Alice2Arc),
 1149: 
 1150:         %% Bob received the message "Hi, Bob!".
 1151:         %% This message will be archived (by alicesroom@localhost).
 1152:         %% User's archive is disabled (i.e. bob@localhost).
 1153:         BobMsg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1154:         escalus:assert(is_message, BobMsg),
 1155:         Arc = exml_query:subelement(BobMsg, <<"archived">>),
 1156:         %% JID of the archive (i.e. where the client would send queries to)
 1157:         By  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"by">>),
 1158:         %% Attribute giving the message's UID within the archive.
 1159:         Id  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"id">>),
 1160: 
 1161:         ?assert_equal(Alice1Arc, Arc),
 1162: 
 1163:         %% Bob requests the room's archive.
 1164: 
 1165:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1166: 
 1167:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_to_room(stanza_archive_request(<<"q1">>), Room)),
 1168:         [_ArcRes, ArcMsg] = assert_respond_size(1, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Bob)),
 1169:         #forwarded_message{result_id=ArcId, message_body=ArcMsgBody} =
 1170:             parse_forwarded_message(ArcMsg),
 1171:         ?assert_equal(Text, ArcMsgBody),
 1172:         ?assert_equal(ArcId, Id),
 1173:         ?assert_equal(RoomAddr, By),
 1174:         ok
 1175:         end,
 1176:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 2}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1177: 
 1178: muc_private_message(Config) ->
 1179:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1180:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
 1181:         Text = <<"Hi, Bob!">>,
 1182:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Alice))),
 1183:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Bob))),
 1184: 
 1185:         %% Bob received presences.
 1186:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2),
 1187: 
 1188:         %% Bob received the room's subject.
 1189:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1),
 1190: 
 1191:         %% Alice sends to Bob, using his occupant JID.
 1192:         %% This message will not be put into room's history.
 1193:         Msg = escalus_stanza:chat_to(room_address(Room, nick(Bob)), Text),
 1194:         escalus:send(Alice, Msg),
 1195: 
 1196:         %% Bob received the message "Hi, Bob!".
 1197:         BobMsg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1198:         escalus:assert(is_message, BobMsg),
 1199: 
 1200:         BobArchiveAddr = escalus_client:short_jid(Bob),
 1201:         ArchivedBy = [exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"by">>)
 1202:                       || Arc <- BobMsg#xmlel.children,
 1203:                          Arc#xmlel.name =:= <<"archived">>,
 1204:                          BobArchiveAddr =/= exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"by">>)],
 1205:         ?assert_equal([], ArchivedBy),
 1206: 
 1207:         %% Bob requests the room's archive.
 1208:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_to_room(stanza_archive_request(<<"q1">>), Room)),
 1209:         [_ArcRes] = assert_respond_size(0, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Bob)),
 1210:         ok
 1211:         end,
 1212:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1213: 
 1214: %% @doc Querying the archive for all messages in a certain timespan.
 1215: range_archive_request(Config) ->
 1216:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1217:         %% Send
 1218:         %% <iq type='get'>
 1219:         %%   <query xmlns='urn:xmpp:mam:tmp'>
 1220:         %%     <start>2010-06-07T00:00:00Z</start>
 1221:         %%     <end>2010-07-07T13:23:54Z</end>
 1222:         %%   </query>
 1223:         %% </iq>
 1224:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_date_range_archive_request()),
 1225:         IQ = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice, 5000),
 1226:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, IQ),
 1227:         ok
 1228:         end,
 1229:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1230: 
 1231: range_archive_request_not_empty(Config) ->
 1232:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1233:         Msgs = ?config(pre_generated_msgs, Config),
 1234:         [_, _, StartMsg, StopMsg | _] = Msgs,
 1235:         {{StartMsgId, _}, _, _, _, _StartMsgPacket} = StartMsg,
 1236:         {{StopMsgId, _}, _, _, _, _StopMsgPacket} = StopMsg,
 1237:         {StartMicro, _} = rpc_apply(mod_mam_utils, decode_compact_uuid, [StartMsgId]),
 1238:         {StopMicro, _} = rpc_apply(mod_mam_utils, decode_compact_uuid, [StopMsgId]),
 1239:         StartTime = make_iso_time(StartMicro),
 1240:         StopTime = make_iso_time(StopMicro),
 1241:         %% Send
 1242:         %% <iq type='get'>
 1243:         %%   <query xmlns='urn:xmpp:mam:tmp'>
 1244:         %%     <start>StartTime</start>
 1245:         %%     <end>StopTime</end>
 1246:         %%   </query>
 1247:         %% </iq>
 1248:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_date_range_archive_request_not_empty(StartTime, StopTime)),
 1249:         %% Receive two messages and IQ
 1250:         M1 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice, 5000),
 1251:         M2 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice, 5000),
 1252:         IQ = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice, 5000),
 1253:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, IQ),
 1254:         #forwarded_message{delay_stamp=Stamp1} = parse_forwarded_message(M1),
 1255:         #forwarded_message{delay_stamp=Stamp2} = parse_forwarded_message(M2),
 1256:         ?assert_equal(list_to_binary(StartTime), Stamp1),
 1257:         ?assert_equal(list_to_binary(StopTime), Stamp2),
 1258:         ok
 1259:         end,
 1260:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1261: 
 1262: make_iso_time(Micro) ->
 1263:     Now = usec:to_now(Micro),
 1264:     DateTime = calendar:now_to_datetime(Now),
 1265:     {Time, TimeZone} = rpc_apply(jlib, timestamp_to_iso, [DateTime, utc]),
 1266:     Time ++ TimeZone.
 1267: 
 1268: %% @doc A query using Result Set Management.
 1269: %% See also `#rsm_in.max'.
 1270: limit_archive_request(Config) ->
 1271:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1272:         %% Send
 1273:         %% <iq type='get' id='q29302'>
 1274:         %%   <query xmlns='urn:xmpp:mam:tmp'>
 1275:         %%       <start>2010-08-07T00:00:00Z</start>
 1276:         %%       <set xmlns='http://jabber.org/protocol/rsm'>
 1277:         %%          <limit>10</limit>
 1278:         %%       </set>
 1279:         %%   </query>
 1280:         %% </iq>
 1281:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_limit_archive_request()),
 1282:         [IQ | Msgs] = wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Alice),
 1283:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, IQ),
 1284:         10 = length(Msgs),
 1285:         ok
 1286:         end,
 1287:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1288: 
 1289: pagination_empty_rset(Config) ->
 1290:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1291:         %% Get the first page of size 5.
 1292:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=0},
 1293: 
 1294:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1295:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"empty_rset">>, RSM)),
 1296:         wait_empty_rset(Alice, 15)
 1297:         end,
 1298:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1299: 
 1300: pagination_first5(Config) ->
 1301:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1302:         %% Get the first page of size 5.
 1303:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5},
 1304:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1305:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"first5">>, RSM)),
 1306:         wait_message_range(Alice, 1, 5),
 1307:         ok
 1308:         end,
 1309:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1310: 
 1311: pagination_first5_opt_count(Config) ->
 1312:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1313:         %% Get the first page of size 5.
 1314:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5},
 1315:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1316:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"first5_opt">>, RSM)),
 1317:         wait_message_range(Alice, 1, 5),
 1318:         ok
 1319:         end,
 1320:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1321: 
 1322: pagination_first25_opt_count_all(Config) ->
 1323:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1324:         %% Get the first page of size 25.
 1325:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=25},
 1326:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1327:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"first25_opt_all">>, RSM)),
 1328:         wait_message_range(Alice, 1, 15),
 1329:         ok
 1330:         end,
 1331:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1332: 
 1333: pagination_last5(Config) ->
 1334:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1335:         %% Get the last page of size 5.
 1336:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, direction=before},
 1337:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1338:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"last5">>, RSM)),
 1339:         wait_message_range(Alice, 11, 15),
 1340:         ok
 1341:         end,
 1342:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1343: 
 1344: pagination_last5_opt_count(Config) ->
 1345:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1346:         %% Get the last page of size 5.
 1347:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, direction=before, opt_count=true},
 1348:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1349:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"last5_opt">>, RSM)),
 1350:         wait_message_range(Alice, 11, 15),
 1351:         ok
 1352:         end,
 1353:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1354: 
 1355: pagination_last25_opt_count_all(Config) ->
 1356:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1357:         %% Get the last page of size 25.
 1358:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=25, direction=before, opt_count=true},
 1359:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1360:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"last25_opt_all">>, RSM)),
 1361:         wait_message_range(Alice, 1, 15),
 1362:         ok
 1363:         end,
 1364:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1365: 
 1366: pagination_offset5_opt_count(Config) ->
 1367:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1368:         %% Skip 5 messages, get 5 messages.
 1369:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, index=5, opt_count=true},
 1370:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1371:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"last5_opt">>, RSM)),
 1372:         wait_message_range(Alice, 6, 10),
 1373:         ok
 1374:         end,
 1375:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1376: 
 1377: pagination_offset5_opt_count_all(Config) ->
 1378:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1379:         %% Skip 5 messages, get 25 messages (only 10 are available).
 1380:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=25, index=5, opt_count=true},
 1381:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1382:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"last5_opt_all">>, RSM)),
 1383:         wait_message_range(Alice, 6, 15),
 1384:         ok
 1385:         end,
 1386:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1387: 
 1388: 
 1389: pagination_before10(Config) ->
 1390:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1391:         %% Get the last page of size 5.
 1392:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, direction=before, id=message_id(10, Config)},
 1393:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1394:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"before10">>, RSM)),
 1395:         wait_message_range(Alice, 5, 9),
 1396:         ok
 1397:         end,
 1398:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1399: 
 1400: pagination_simple_before10(Config) ->
 1401:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1402:         %% Get the last page of size 5.
 1403:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, direction=before, id=message_id(10, Config), simple=true},
 1404:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1405:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"before10">>, RSM)),
 1406:      %% wait_message_range(Client, TotalCount,    Offset, FromN, ToN),
 1407:         wait_message_range(Alice,   undefined, undefined,     5,   9),
 1408:         ok
 1409:         end,
 1410:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1411: 
 1412: pagination_after10(Config) ->
 1413:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1414:         %% Get the last page of size 5.
 1415:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, direction='after', id=message_id(10, Config)},
 1416:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1417:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"after10">>, RSM)),
 1418:         wait_message_range(Alice, 11, 15),
 1419:         ok
 1420:         end,
 1421:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1422: 
 1423: %% Select first page of recent messages after last known id.
 1424: %% Paginating from newest messages to oldest ones.
 1425: pagination_last_after_id5(Config) ->
 1426:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1427:         %% Get the last page of size 5 after 5-th message.
 1428:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, direction='before',
 1429:                 after_id=message_id(5, Config)},
 1430:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1431:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"last_after_id5">>, RSM)),
 1432:      %% wait_message_range(Client, TotalCount, Offset, FromN, ToN),
 1433:         wait_message_range(Alice,          10,      5,    11,  15),
 1434:         ok
 1435:         end,
 1436:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1437: 
 1438: %% Select second page of recent messages after last known id.
 1439: pagination_last_after_id5_before_id11(Config) ->
 1440:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1441:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, direction='before',
 1442:                 after_id=message_id(5, Config),
 1443:                 before_id=message_id(11, Config)},
 1444:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1445:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"last_after_id5_before_id11">>, RSM)),
 1446:      %% wait_message_range(Client, TotalCount, Offset, FromN, ToN),
 1447:         wait_message_range(Alice,           5,      0,     6,  10),
 1448:         ok
 1449:         end,
 1450:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1451: 
 1452: generate_message_text(N) when is_integer(N) ->
 1453:     <<"Message #", (list_to_binary(integer_to_list(N)))/binary>>.
 1454: 
 1455: rsm_send(Config, User, Packet) ->
 1456:     case ?config(with_rsm, Config) of
 1457:         true ->
 1458:             BWithJID = nick_to_jid(bob, Config),
 1459:             rsm_send_1(Config, User, add_with_jid(BWithJID, Packet));
 1460:         _ ->
 1461:             rsm_send_1(Config, User, Packet)
 1462:     end.
 1463: 
 1464: rsm_send_1(Config, User, Packet) ->
 1465:     case ?config(muc_rsm, Config) of
 1466:         true ->
 1467:             Room = ?config(room, Config),
 1468:             escalus:send(User, stanza_to_room(Packet, Room));
 1469:         _ ->
 1470:             escalus:send(User, Packet)
 1471:     end.
 1472: 
 1473: prefs_set_request(Config) ->
 1474:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1475:         %% Send
 1476:         %%
 1477:         %% <iq type='set' id='juliet2'>
 1478:         %%   <prefs xmlns='urn:xmpp:mam:tmp' default="roster">
 1479:         %%     <always>
 1480:         %%       <jid>romeo@montague.net</jid>
 1481:         %%     </always>
 1482:         %%     <never>
 1483:         %%       <jid>montague@montague.net</jid>
 1484:         %%     </never>
 1485:         %%   </prefs>
 1486:         %% </iq>
 1487:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_prefs_set_request(<<"roster">>,
 1488:                                                      [<<"romeo@montague.net">>],
 1489:                                                      [<<"montague@montague.net">>])),
 1490:         ReplySet = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1491: 
 1492:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_prefs_get_request()),
 1493:         ReplyGet = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1494: 
 1495:         ResultIQ1 = parse_prefs_result_iq(ReplySet),
 1496:         ResultIQ2 = parse_prefs_result_iq(ReplyGet),
 1497:         ?assert_equal(ResultIQ1, ResultIQ2),
 1498:         ok
 1499:         end,
 1500:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1501: 
 1502: %% Test reproducing https://github.com/esl/MongooseIM/issues/263
 1503: %% The idea is this: in a "perfect" world jid elements are put together
 1504: %% without whitespaces. In the real world it is not true.
 1505: %% Put "\n" between two jid elements.
 1506: prefs_set_cdata_request(Config) ->
 1507:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1508:         %% Send
 1509:         %%
 1510:         %% <iq type='set' id='juliet2'>
 1511:         %%   <prefs xmlns='urn:xmpp:mam:tmp' default="roster">
 1512:         %%     <always>
 1513:         %%       <jid>romeo@montague.net</jid>
 1514:         %%       <jid>montague@montague.net</jid>
 1515:         %%     </always>
 1516:         %%   </prefs>
 1517:         %% </iq>
 1518:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_prefs_set_request(<<"roster">>,
 1519:                                                      [<<"romeo@montague.net">>,
 1520:                                                       {xmlcdata, <<"\n">>}, %% Put as it is
 1521:                                                       <<"montague@montague.net">>], [])),
 1522:         ReplySet = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1523: 
 1524:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_prefs_get_request()),
 1525:         ReplyGet = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1526: 
 1527:         ResultIQ1 = parse_prefs_result_iq(ReplySet),
 1528:         ResultIQ2 = parse_prefs_result_iq(ReplyGet),
 1529:         ?assert_equal(ResultIQ1, ResultIQ2),
 1530:         ok
 1531:         end,
 1532:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1533: 
 1534: mam_service_discovery(Config) ->
 1535:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1536:         Server = escalus_client:server(Alice),
 1537:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:disco_info(Server)),
 1538:         Stanza = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1539:         try
 1540:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, Stanza),
 1541:         escalus:assert(has_feature, [mam_ns_binary()], Stanza),
 1542:         ok
 1543:         catch Class:Reason ->
 1544:             Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
 1545:             ct:pal("Stanza ~p.", [Stanza]),
 1546:             erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
 1547:         end
 1548:         end,
 1549:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1550: 
 1551: %% Check, that MUC is supported.
 1552: muc_service_discovery(Config) ->
 1553:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1554:         Domain = escalus_config:get_config(ejabberd_domain, Config),
 1555:         Server = escalus_client:server(Alice),
 1556:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:service_discovery(Server)),
 1557:         Stanza = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1558:         escalus:assert(has_service, [muc_host()], Stanza),
 1559:         escalus:assert(is_stanza_from, [Domain], Stanza),
 1560:         ok
 1561:         end,
 1562:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1563: 
 1564: iq_spoofing(Config) ->
 1565:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1566:         %% Sending iqs between clients is allowed.
 1567:         %% Every client MUST check "from" and "id" attributes.
 1568:         %% This test checks, that server assign corrent "from" attribute
 1569:         %% when it is not specified.
 1570:         To = escalus_utils:get_jid(Alice),
 1571:         From = escalus_utils:get_jid(Bob),
 1572:         escalus:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:to(result_iq(), To)),
 1573:         Stanza = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1574:         escalus_assert:is_stanza_from(From, Stanza),
 1575:         escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Alice),
 1576:         escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Bob),
 1577:         ok
 1578:         end,
 1579:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1580: 
 1581: result_iq() ->
 1582:     #xmlel{
 1583:         name = <<"iq">>,
 1584:         attrs = [{<<"id">>,<<"xxx">>}, {<<"type">>,<<"result">>}],
 1585:         children = [#xmlel{name = <<"query">>}]}.
 1586: 
 1587: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1588: %% Helpers
 1589: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1590: 
 1591: nick(User) -> escalus_utils:get_username(User).
 1592: 
 1593: mam_ns_binary() -> <<"urn:xmpp:mam:tmp">>.
 1594: muc_ns_binary() -> <<"http://jabber.org/protocol/muc">>.
 1595: 
 1596: stanza_purge_single_message(MessId) ->
 1597:     escalus_stanza:iq(<<"set">>, [#xmlel{
 1598:        name = <<"purge">>,
 1599:        attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>,mam_ns_binary()}, {<<"id">>, MessId}]
 1600:     }]).
 1601: 
 1602: stanza_purge_multiple_messages(BStart, BEnd, BWithJID) ->
 1603:     escalus_stanza:iq(<<"set">>, [#xmlel{
 1604:        name = <<"purge">>,
 1605:        attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>,mam_ns_binary()}],
 1606:        children = skip_undefined([
 1607:            maybe_start_elem(BStart),
 1608:            maybe_end_elem(BEnd),
 1609:            maybe_with_elem(BWithJID)])
 1610:     }]).
 1611: 
 1612: 
 1613: skip_undefined(Xs) ->
 1614:     [X || X <- Xs, X =/= undefined].
 1615: 
 1616: maybe_attr(_, undefined) ->
 1617:     [];
 1618: maybe_attr(K, V) ->
 1619:     [{K, V}].
 1620: 
 1621: mam_ns_attr() ->
 1622:     [{<<"xmlns">>,mam_ns_binary()}].
 1623: 
 1624: maybe_start_elem(undefined) ->
 1625:     undefined;
 1626: maybe_start_elem(BStart) ->
 1627:     #xmlel{
 1628:         name = <<"start">>,
 1629:         children = #xmlcdata{content = BStart}}.
 1630: 
 1631: maybe_end_elem(undefined) ->
 1632:     undefined;
 1633: maybe_end_elem(BEnd) ->
 1634:     #xmlel{
 1635:         name = <<"end">>,
 1636:         children = #xmlcdata{content = BEnd}}.
 1637: 
 1638: maybe_with_elem(undefined) ->
 1639:     undefined;
 1640: maybe_with_elem(BWithJID) ->
 1641:     #xmlel{
 1642:         name = <<"with">>,
 1643:         children = #xmlcdata{content = BWithJID}}.
 1644: 
 1645: %% An optional 'queryid' attribute allows the client to match results to
 1646: %% a certain query.
 1647: stanza_archive_request(QueryId) ->
 1648:     stanza_lookup_messages_iq(QueryId,
 1649:                               undefined, undefined,
 1650:                               undefined, undefined).
 1651: 
 1652: stanza_date_range_archive_request() ->
 1653:     stanza_lookup_messages_iq(undefined,
 1654:                               "2010-06-07T00:00:00Z", "2010-07-07T13:23:54Z",
 1655:                               undefined, undefined).
 1656: 
 1657: stanza_date_range_archive_request_not_empty(Start, Stop) ->
 1658:     stanza_lookup_messages_iq(undefined,
 1659:                               Start, Stop,
 1660:                               undefined, undefined).
 1661: 
 1662: stanza_limit_archive_request() ->
 1663:     stanza_lookup_messages_iq(undefined, "2010-08-07T00:00:00Z",
 1664:                               undefined, undefined, #rsm_in{max=10}).
 1665: 
 1666: stanza_page_archive_request(QueryId, RSM) ->
 1667:     stanza_lookup_messages_iq(QueryId, undefined, undefined, undefined, RSM).
 1668: 
 1669: stanza_filtered_by_jid_request(BWithJID) ->
 1670:     stanza_lookup_messages_iq(undefined, undefined,
 1671:                               undefined, BWithJID, undefined).
 1672: 
 1673: stanza_lookup_messages_iq(QueryId, BStart, BEnd, BWithJID, RSM) ->
 1674:     escalus_stanza:iq(<<"get">>, [#xmlel{
 1675:        name = <<"query">>,
 1676:        attrs = mam_ns_attr()
 1677:             ++ maybe_attr(<<"queryid">>, QueryId)
 1678:             ++ border_attributes(RSM),
 1679:        children = skip_undefined([
 1680:            maybe_simple_elem(RSM),
 1681:            maybe_opt_count_elem(RSM),
 1682:            maybe_start_elem(BStart),
 1683:            maybe_end_elem(BEnd),
 1684:            maybe_with_elem(BWithJID),
 1685:            maybe_rsm_elem(RSM)])
 1686:     }]).
 1687: 
 1688: maybe_simple_elem(#rsm_in{simple=true}) ->
 1689:     [#xmlel{name = <<"simple">>}];
 1690: maybe_simple_elem(_) ->
 1691:     [].
 1692: 
 1693: maybe_opt_count_elem(#rsm_in{opt_count=true}) ->
 1694:     [#xmlel{name = <<"opt_count">>}];
 1695: maybe_opt_count_elem(_) ->
 1696:     [].
 1697: 
 1698: border_attributes(undefined) ->
 1699:     [];
 1700: border_attributes(#rsm_in{
 1701:         before_id=BeforeId, after_id=AfterId, from_id=FromId, to_id=ToId}) ->
 1702:     maybe_attr(<<"before_id">>, BeforeId)
 1703:     ++ maybe_attr(<<"after_id">>, AfterId)
 1704:     ++ maybe_attr(<<"from_id">>, FromId)
 1705:     ++ maybe_attr(<<"to_id">>, ToId).
 1706: 
 1707: maybe_rsm_elem(undefined) ->
 1708:     undefined;
 1709: maybe_rsm_elem(#rsm_in{max=Max, direction=Direction, id=Id, index=Index}) ->
 1710:     #xmlel{name = <<"set">>,
 1711:            children = skip_undefined([
 1712:                 maybe_rsm_max(Max),
 1713:                 maybe_rsm_index(Index),
 1714:                 maybe_rsm_direction(Direction, Id)])}.
 1715: 
 1716: maybe_rsm_id(undefined) -> [];
 1717: maybe_rsm_id(Id) -> #xmlcdata{content = Id}.
 1718: 
 1719: maybe_rsm_direction(undefined, undefined) ->
 1720:     undefined;
 1721: maybe_rsm_direction(Direction, Id) ->
 1722:     #xmlel{
 1723:         name = atom_to_binary(Direction, latin1),
 1724:         children = maybe_rsm_id(Id)}.
 1725: 
 1726: maybe_rsm_index(undefined) ->
 1727:     undefined;
 1728: maybe_rsm_index(Index) when is_integer(Index) ->
 1729:     #xmlel{
 1730:         name = <<"index">>,
 1731:         children = #xmlcdata{content = integer_to_list(Index)}}.
 1732: 
 1733: maybe_rsm_max(undefined) ->
 1734:     undefined;
 1735: maybe_rsm_max(Max) when is_integer(Max) ->
 1736:     #xmlel{
 1737:         name = <<"max">>,
 1738:         children = #xmlcdata{content = integer_to_list(Max)}}.
 1739: 
 1740: add_with_jid(BWithJID,
 1741:     IQ=#xmlel{children=[
 1742:         Query=#xmlel{children=QueryChildren}]}) ->
 1743:     IQ#xmlel{children=[
 1744:         Query#xmlel{children=[maybe_with_elem(BWithJID) | QueryChildren]}]}.
 1745: 
 1746: assert_only_one_of_many_is_equal(Archived, Sent) ->
 1747:     Scanned = lists:map(fun parse_forwarded_message/1, Archived),
 1748:     Same = lists:filter(fun (Stanza) -> is_same_message_text(Stanza, Sent) end, Scanned),
 1749:     ?assert_equal(1, erlang:length(Same)).
 1750: 
 1751: is_same_message_text(Stanza, Raw) ->
 1752:     #forwarded_message{message_body = A} = Stanza,
 1753:     A =:= Raw.
 1754: 
 1755: %% ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 1756: %% PREFERENCE QUERIES
 1757: 
 1758: stanza_prefs_set_request(DefaultMode, AlwaysJIDs, NeverJIDs) ->
 1759:     AlwaysEl = #xmlel{name = <<"always">>,
 1760:                       children = encode_jids(AlwaysJIDs)},
 1761:     NeverEl  = #xmlel{name = <<"never">>,
 1762:                       children = encode_jids(NeverJIDs)},
 1763:     escalus_stanza:iq(<<"set">>, [#xmlel{
 1764:        name = <<"prefs">>,
 1765:        attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>,mam_ns_binary()}]
 1766:                ++ [{<<"default">>, DefaultMode} || is_def(DefaultMode)],
 1767:        children = [AlwaysEl, NeverEl]
 1768:     }]).
 1769: 
 1770: stanza_prefs_get_request() ->
 1771:     escalus_stanza:iq(<<"get">>, [#xmlel{
 1772:        name = <<"prefs">>,
 1773:        attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>,mam_ns_binary()}]
 1774:     }]).
 1775: 
 1776: %% Allows to cdata to be put as it is
 1777: encode_jids(JIDs) ->
 1778:     [encode_jid_or_cdata(JID) || JID <- JIDs].
 1779: 
 1780: encode_jid_or_cdata({xmlcdata, Text}) ->
 1781:     {xmlcdata, Text};
 1782: encode_jid_or_cdata(JID) ->
 1783:     #xmlel{name = <<"jid">>,
 1784:            children = [#xmlcdata{content = JID}]}.
 1785: 
 1786: %% ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 1787: %% PARSING RESPONDS
 1788: 
 1789: parse_forwarded_message(#xmlel{name = <<"message">>,
 1790:                                attrs = Attrs, children = Children}) ->
 1791:     M = #forwarded_message{
 1792:         from = proplists:get_value(<<"from">>, Attrs),
 1793:         to   = proplists:get_value(<<"to">>, Attrs)},
 1794:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[message]'/2, M, Children).
 1795: 
 1796: 'parse_children[message]'(#xmlel{name = <<"result">>,
 1797:                                  attrs = Attrs,
 1798:                                  children = Children}, M) ->
 1799:     M1 = M#forwarded_message{
 1800:         result_queryid = proplists:get_value(<<"queryid">>, Attrs),
 1801:         result_id      = proplists:get_value(<<"id">>, Attrs)},
 1802:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[message/result]'/2, M1, Children).
 1803: 
 1804: 'parse_children[message/result]'(#xmlel{name = <<"forwarded">>,
 1805:                                         children = Children}, M) ->
 1806:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[message/result/forwarded]'/2, M, Children).
 1807: 
 1808: 
 1809: 'parse_children[message/result/forwarded]'(#xmlel{name = <<"delay">>,
 1810:                                                   attrs = Attrs}, M) ->
 1811:     M#forwarded_message{
 1812:         delay_from  = proplists:get_value(<<"from">>, Attrs),
 1813:         delay_stamp = proplists:get_value(<<"stamp">>, Attrs)};
 1814: 'parse_children[message/result/forwarded]'(#xmlel{name = <<"message">>,
 1815:                                                   attrs = Attrs,
 1816:                                                   children = Children}, M) ->
 1817:     M1 = M#forwarded_message{
 1818:         message_to   = proplists:get_value(<<"to">>, Attrs),
 1819:         message_type = proplists:get_value(<<"type">>, Attrs)},
 1820:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[message/result/forwarded/message]'/2,
 1821:                 M1, Children).
 1822: 
 1823: 'parse_children[message/result/forwarded/message]'(#xmlel{name = <<"body">>,
 1824:         children = [{xmlcdata, Body}]}, M) ->
 1825:     M#forwarded_message{message_body = Body};
 1826: %% Parse `<archived />' here.
 1827: 'parse_children[message/result/forwarded/message]'(_, M) ->
 1828:     M.
 1829: 
 1830: %% Num is 1-based.
 1831: message_id(Num, Config) ->
 1832:     AllMessages = proplists:get_value(all_messages, Config),
 1833:     #forwarded_message{result_id=Id} = lists:nth(Num, AllMessages),
 1834:     Id.
 1835: 
 1836: 
 1837: %% @doc Result query iq.
 1838: %%
 1839: %% [{xmlel,<<"iq">>,
 1840: %%     [{<<"from">>,<<"alice@localhost">>},
 1841: %%      {<<"to">>,<<"alice@localhost/res1">>},
 1842: %%      {<<"id">>,<<"387862024ce65379b049e19751e4309e">>},
 1843: %%      {<<"type">>,<<"result">>}],
 1844: %%     []}]
 1845: %%
 1846: %%
 1847: %%  [{xmlel,<<"iq">>,
 1848: %%       [{<<"from">>,<<"alice@localhost">>},
 1849: %%        {<<"to">>,<<"alice@localhost/res1">>},
 1850: %%        {<<"id">>,<<"c256a18c4b720465e215a81362d41eb7">>},
 1851: %%        {<<"type">>,<<"result">>}],
 1852: %%       [{xmlel,<<"query">>,
 1853: %%            [{<<"xmlns">>,<<"urn:xmpp:mam:tmp">>}],
 1854: %%            [{xmlel,<<"set">>,
 1855: %%                 [{<<"xmlns">>,<<"http://jabber.org/protocol/rsm">>}],
 1856: %%                 [{xmlel,<<"first">>,
 1857: %%                      [{<<"index">>,<<"10">>}],
 1858: %%                      [{xmlcdata,<<"103439">>}]},
 1859: %%                  {xmlel,<<"last">>,[],[{xmlcdata,<<"103447">>}]},
 1860: %%                  {xmlel,<<"count">>,[],[{xmlcdata,<<"15">>}]}]}]}]}]
 1861: parse_result_iq(#xmlel{name = <<"iq">>,
 1862:                        attrs = Attrs, children = Children}) ->
 1863:     IQ = #result_iq{
 1864:         from = proplists:get_value(<<"from">>, Attrs),
 1865:         to   = proplists:get_value(<<"to">>, Attrs),
 1866:         id   = proplists:get_value(<<"id">>, Attrs)},
