 1867:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[iq]'/2, IQ, Children).
 1868: 
 1869: 'parse_children[iq]'(#xmlel{name = <<"query">>, children = Children},
 1870:                      IQ) ->
 1871:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[iq/query]'/2, IQ, Children).
 1872: 
 1873: 
 1874: 'parse_children[iq/query]'(#xmlel{name = <<"set">>,
 1875:                                   children = Children},
 1876:                            IQ) ->
 1877:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[iq/query/set]'/2, IQ, Children).
 1878: 
 1879: 'parse_children[iq/query/set]'(#xmlel{name = <<"first">>,
 1880:                                       attrs = Attrs,
 1881:                                       children = [{xmlcdata, First}]},
 1882:                                IQ) ->
 1883:     Index = case proplists:get_value(<<"index">>, Attrs) of
 1884:                 undefined -> undefined;
 1885:                 X -> list_to_integer(binary_to_list(X))
 1886:             end,
 1887:     IQ#result_iq{first_index = Index, first = First};
 1888: 'parse_children[iq/query/set]'(#xmlel{name = <<"last">>,
 1889:                                       children = [{xmlcdata, Last}]},
 1890:                                IQ) ->
 1891:     IQ#result_iq{last = Last};
 1892: 'parse_children[iq/query/set]'(#xmlel{name = <<"count">>,
 1893:                                       children = [{xmlcdata, Count}]},
 1894:                                IQ) ->
 1895:     IQ#result_iq{count = list_to_integer(binary_to_list(Count))};
 1896: 'parse_children[iq/query/set]'(_, IQ) -> IQ.
 1897: 
 1898: is_def(X) -> X =/= undefined.
 1899: 
 1900: 
 1901: 
 1902: parse_prefs_result_iq(#xmlel{name = <<"iq">>, children = Children}) ->
 1903:     IQ = #prefs_result_iq{},
 1904:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[prefs_iq]'/2, IQ, Children).
 1905: 
 1906: 'parse_children[prefs_iq]'(#xmlel{name = <<"prefs">>,
 1907:                                   attrs = Attrs, children = Children},
 1908:                            IQ) ->
 1909:     DefaultMode = proplists:get_value(<<"default">>, Attrs),
 1910:     IQ1 = IQ#prefs_result_iq{default_mode = DefaultMode},
 1911:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[prefs_iq/prefs]'/2, IQ1, Children).
 1912: 
 1913: 
 1914: 'parse_children[prefs_iq/prefs]'(#xmlel{name = <<"always">>,
 1915:                                         children = Children},
 1916:                                  IQ) ->
 1917:     IQ#prefs_result_iq{always_jids = lists:sort(parse_jids(Children))};
 1918: 'parse_children[prefs_iq/prefs]'(#xmlel{name = <<"never">>,
 1919:                                         children = Children},
 1920:                                  IQ) ->
 1921:     IQ#prefs_result_iq{never_jids = lists:sort(parse_jids(Children))}.
 1922: 
 1923: 
 1924: parse_jids(Els) ->
 1925:     [JID || #xmlel{name = <<"jid">>, children = [{xmlcdata, JID}]} <- Els].
 1926: 
 1927: %% <iq type='error' id='q29302'>
 1928: %%   <error type='modify'>
 1929: %%     <policy-violation xmlns='urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:xmpp-stanzas'/>
 1930: %%     <text xmlns='urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:xmpp-stanzas'>Too many results</text>
 1931: %%   </error>
 1932: %% </iq>
 1933: parse_error_iq(#xmlel{name = <<"iq">>,
 1934:                       attrs = Attrs, children = Children}) ->
 1935: 
 1936:     IQ = #error_iq{
 1937:         type = proplists:get_value(<<"type">>, Attrs),
 1938:         id   = proplists:get_value(<<"id">>, Attrs)},
 1939:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[error_iq]'/2, IQ, Children).
 1940: 
 1941: 
 1942: 'parse_children[error_iq]'(#xmlel{name = <<"error">>,
 1943:                                   attrs = Attrs, children = Children}, IQ) ->
 1944:     IQ1 = IQ#error_iq{
 1945:         error_type = proplists:get_value(<<"type">>, Attrs)},
 1946:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[error_iq/error]'/2, IQ1, Children);
 1947: 'parse_children[error_iq]'(_, IQ) ->
 1948:     IQ.
 1949: 
 1950: 'parse_children[error_iq/error]'(#xmlel{name = <<"text">>,
 1951:                                  children = [{xmlcdata, Text}]}, IQ) ->
 1952:     IQ#error_iq{text = Text};
 1953: 'parse_children[error_iq/error]'(#xmlel{name = Condition}, IQ) ->
 1954:     IQ#error_iq{condition = Condition};
 1955: 'parse_children[error_iq/error]'(_, IQ) ->
 1956:     IQ.
 1957: 
 1958: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1959: %% Helpers (muc)
 1960: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1961: 
 1962: generate_rpc_jid({_,User}) ->
 1963:     {username, Username} = lists:keyfind(username, 1, User),
 1964:     {server, Server} = lists:keyfind(server, 1, User),
 1965:     LUsername = escalus_utils:jid_to_lower(Username),
 1966:     LServer = escalus_utils:jid_to_lower(Server),
 1967:     {jid, Username, Server, <<"rpc">>, LUsername, LServer, <<"rpc">>}.
 1968: 
 1969: start_alice_room(Config) ->
 1970:     %% TODO: ensure, that the room's archive is empty
 1971:     RoomName = <<"alicesroom">>,
 1972:     RoomNick = <<"alicesnick">>,
 1973:     [Alice | _] = ?config(escalus_users, Config),
 1974:     start_room(Config, Alice, RoomName, RoomNick, [{persistent, true}]).
 1975: 
 1976: start_room(Config, User, Room, Nick, Opts) ->
 1977:     From = generate_rpc_jid(User),
 1978:     rpc_apply(mod_muc, create_instant_room,
 1979:         [<<"localhost">>, Room, From, Nick, Opts]),
 1980:     [{nick, Nick}, {room, Room} | Config].
 1981: 
 1982: destroy_room(Config) ->
 1983:     RoomName = ?config(room, Config),
 1984:     delete_room_archive(muc_host(), RoomName),
 1985:     case rpc_apply(ets, lookup, [muc_online_room, {RoomName, muc_host()}]) of
 1986:         [{_,_,Pid}|_] -> gen_fsm:send_all_state_event(Pid, destroy);
 1987:         _ -> ok
 1988:     end.
 1989: 
 1990: stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, Nick) ->
 1991:     Elem = #xmlel{ name = <<"x">>,
 1992:                    attrs=[{<<"xmlns">>, muc_ns_binary()}]},
 1993:     stanza_to_room(escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>, [Elem]),
 1994:                    Room, Nick).
 1995: 
 1996: stanza_to_room(Stanza, Room) ->
 1997:     escalus_stanza:to(Stanza, room_address(Room)).
 1998: 
 1999: stanza_to_room(Stanza, Room, Nick) ->
 2000:     escalus_stanza:to(Stanza, room_address(Room, Nick)).
 2001: 
 2002: room_address(Room) when is_binary(Room) ->
 2003:     <<Room/binary, "@", (muc_host())/binary>>.
 2004: 
 2005: room_address(Room, Nick) when is_binary(Room), is_binary(Nick) ->
 2006:     <<Room/binary, "@", (muc_host())/binary, "/", Nick/binary>>.
 2007: 
 2008: 
 2009: send_muc_rsm_messages(Config) ->
 2010:     Pid = self(),
 2011:     Room = ?config(room, Config),
 2012:     RoomAddr = room_address(Room),
 2013:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 2014:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Alice))),
 2015:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Bob))),
 2016: 
 2017:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 3),
 2018:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 3),
 2019: 
 2020:         %% Alice sends messages to Bob.
 2021:         [escalus:send(Alice,
 2022:                       escalus_stanza:groupchat_to(RoomAddr, generate_message_text(N)))
 2023:          || N <- lists:seq(1, 15)],
 2024:         %% Bob is waiting for 15 messages for 5 seconds.
 2025:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 15, 5000),
 2026:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 15, 5000),
 2027:         %% Get whole history.
 2028:         escalus:send(Alice,
 2029:             stanza_to_room(stanza_archive_request(<<"all_room_messages">>), Room)),
 2030:         [_ArcIQ|AllMessages] =
 2031:             assert_respond_size(15, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Alice)),
 2032:         ParsedMessages = [parse_forwarded_message(M) || M <- AllMessages],
 2033:         Pid ! {parsed_messages, ParsedMessages},
 2034:         ok
 2035:         end,
 2036:     Config1 = escalus:init_per_testcase(pre_rsm, Config),
 2037:     escalus:story(Config1, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F),
 2038:     ParsedMessages = receive {parsed_messages, PM} -> PM
 2039:                      after 5000 -> error(receive_timeout) end,
 2040: 
 2041:     escalus:end_per_testcase(pre_rsm, Config1),
 2042:     [{all_messages, ParsedMessages}|Config].
 2043: 
 2044: send_rsm_messages(Config) ->
 2045:     Pid = self(),
 2046:     Room = ?config(room, Config),
 2047:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 2048:         %% Alice sends messages to Bob.
 2049:         [escalus:send(Alice,
 2050:                       escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, generate_message_text(N)))
 2051:          || N <- lists:seq(1, 15)],
 2052:         %% Bob is waiting for 15 messages for 5 seconds.
 2053:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 15, 5000),
 2054:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 2055:         %% Get whole history.
 2056:         rsm_send(Config, Alice, stanza_archive_request(<<"all_messages">>)),
 2057:         [_ArcIQ|AllMessages] =
 2058:             assert_respond_size(15, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Alice)),
 2059:         ParsedMessages = [parse_forwarded_message(M) || M <- AllMessages],
 2060:         Pid ! {parsed_messages, ParsedMessages},
 2061:         ok
 2062:         end,
 2063:     Config1 = escalus:init_per_testcase(pre_rsm, Config),
 2064:     escalus:story(Config1, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F),
 2065:     ParsedMessages = receive {parsed_messages, PM} -> PM
 2066:                      after 5000 -> error(receive_timeout) end,
 2067: 
 2068:     escalus:end_per_testcase(pre_rsm, Config1),
 2069:     [{all_messages, ParsedMessages}|Config].
 2070: 
 2071: append_subelem(Elem=#xmlel{children=Cs}, SubElem) ->
 2072:     Elem#xmlel{children=Cs ++ [SubElem]}.
 2073: 
 2074: archived_elem(By, Id) ->
 2075:     #xmlel{name = <<"archived">>,
 2076:            attrs = [{<<"by">>, By}, {<<"id">>, Id}]}.
 2077: 
 2078: clean_archives(Config) ->
 2079:     SUs = serv_users(Config),
 2080:     %% It is not the best place to delete these messages.
 2081:     [ok = delete_offline_messages(S, U) || {S, U} <- SUs],
 2082:     [ok = delete_archive(S, U) || {S, U} <- SUs],
 2083:     timer:sleep(1500),
 2084:     [assert_empty_archive(S, U) || {S, U} <- SUs],
 2085:     Config.
 2086: 
 2087: clean_room_archive(Config) ->
 2088:     Room = ?config(room, Config),
 2089:     delete_room_archive(muc_host(), Room),
 2090:     timer:sleep(500),
 2091:     maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 2092:     assert_empty_room_archive(muc_host(), Room),
 2093:     Config.
 2094: 
 2095: serv_users(Config) ->
 2096:     [serv_user(Config, UserSpec)
 2097:      || {_, UserSpec} <- escalus_users:get_users(all)].
 2098: 
 2099: serv_user(Config, UserSpec) ->
 2100:     [Username, Server, _Pass] = escalus_users:get_usp(Config, UserSpec),
 2101:     {Server, Username}.
 2102: 
 2103: %% @doc Check, that the archive is empty.
 2104: assert_empty_archive(Server, Username) ->
 2105:     case archive_size(Server, Username) of
 2106:        0 -> ok;
 2107:        X -> ct:fail({not_empty, Server, Username, X})
 2108:     end.
 2109: 
 2110: %% @doc Check, that the archive is empty.
 2111: assert_empty_room_archive(Server, Username) ->
 2112:     case room_archive_size(Server, Username) of
 2113:        0 -> ok;
 2114:        X -> ct:fail({not_empty, Server, Username, X})
 2115:     end.
 2116: 
 2117: 
 2118: archive_size(Server, Username) ->
 2119:     rpc_apply(mod_mam, archive_size, [Server, Username]).
 2120: 
 2121: room_archive_size(Server, Username) ->
 2122:     rpc_apply(mod_mam_muc, archive_size, [Server, Username]).
 2123: 
 2124: delete_archive(Server, Username) ->
 2125:     rpc_apply(mod_mam, delete_archive, [Server, Username]).
 2126: 
 2127: delete_room_archive(Server, Username) ->
 2128:     rpc_apply(mod_mam_muc, delete_archive, [Server, Username]).
 2129: 
 2130: delete_offline_messages(Server, Username) ->
 2131:     %% Do not care
 2132:     catch rpc_apply(mod_offline, remove_user, [Username, Server]),
 2133:     ok.
 2134: 
 2135: wait_message_range(Client, FromN, ToN) ->
 2136:     wait_message_range(Client, 15, FromN-1, FromN, ToN).
 2137: 
 2138: wait_message_range(Client, TotalCount, Offset, FromN, ToN) ->
 2139:     [IQ|Messages] = wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Client),
 2140:     ParsedMessages = parse_messages(Messages),
 2141:     ParsedIQ = parse_result_iq(IQ),
 2142:     try
 2143:         ?assert_equal(TotalCount, ParsedIQ#result_iq.count),
 2144:         ?assert_equal(Offset, ParsedIQ#result_iq.first_index),
 2145:         %% Compare body of the messages.
 2146:         ?assert_equal([generate_message_text(N) || N <- lists:seq(FromN, ToN)],
 2147:                       [B || #forwarded_message{message_body=B} <- ParsedMessages]),
 2148:         ok
 2149:     catch Class:Reason ->
 2150:         Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
 2151:         ct:pal("IQ: ~p~n"
 2152:                "Messages: ~p~n"
 2153:                "Parsed messages: ~p~n",
 2154:                [IQ, Messages, ParsedMessages]),
 2155:         erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
 2156:     end.
 2157: 
 2158: 
 2159: wait_empty_rset(Alice, TotalCount) ->
 2160:     [IQ] = wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Alice),
 2161:     ParsedIQ = parse_result_iq(IQ),
 2162:     try
 2163:         ?assert_equal(TotalCount, ParsedIQ#result_iq.count),
 2164:         ok
 2165:     catch Class:Reason ->
 2166:         Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
 2167:         ct:pal("IQ: ~p~n", [IQ]),
 2168:         erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
 2169:     end.
 2170: 
 2171: parse_messages(Messages) ->
 2172:     try [parse_forwarded_message(M) || M <- Messages]
 2173:     catch Class:Reason ->
 2174:         Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
 2175:         ct:pal("Messages: ~p~n", [Messages]),
 2176:         erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
 2177:     end.
 2178: 
 2179: bootstrap_archive(Config) ->
 2180:     random:seed(now()),
 2181:     Domain = escalus_ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain),
 2182:     ArcJID = {<<"alice@",Domain/binary>>, make_jid(<<"alice">> ,Domain, <<>>),
 2183:              rpc_apply(mod_mam, archive_id, [Domain, <<"alice">>])},
 2184:     OtherUsers = [{<<"bob@",Domain/binary>>, make_jid(<<"bob">>, Domain, <<>>),
 2185:                    rpc_apply(mod_mam, archive_id, [Domain, <<"bob">>])},
 2186:                   {<<"carol@",Domain/binary>>, make_jid(<<"carol">>, Domain, <<>>),
 2187:                    rpc_apply(mod_mam, archive_id, [Domain, <<"carol">>])}],
 2188:     Msgs = generate_msgs_for_days(ArcJID, OtherUsers, 16),
 2189:     put_msgs(Msgs),
 2190:     timer:sleep(1500),
 2191:     [{pre_generated_msgs, sort_msgs(Msgs)} | Config].
 2192: 
 2193: sort_msgs(Msgs) ->
 2194:     SortFun = fun({{ID1, _}, _, _, _, _}, {{ID2, _}, _, _, _, _}) ->
 2195:         ID1 =< ID2
 2196:     end,
 2197:     lists:sort(SortFun,Msgs).
 2198: 
 2199: generate_msgs_for_days(OwnerJID, OtherUsers, Days) ->
 2200:     {TodayDate, _} = calendar:local_time(),
 2201:     Today = calendar:date_to_gregorian_days(TodayDate),
 2202:     StartDay = Today - Days,
 2203:     lists:flatten([generate_msgs_for_day(Day, OwnerJID, OtherUsers)
 2204:                    || Day <- lists:seq(StartDay, Today)]).
 2205: 
 2206: generate_msgs_for_day(Day, OwnerJID, OtherUsers) ->
 2207:     Date = calendar:gregorian_days_to_date(Day),
 2208: 
 2209:     [generate_msg_for_date_user(OwnerJID, RemoteJID, {Date, random_time()})
 2210:      || RemoteJID <- OtherUsers].
 2211: 
 2212: generate_msg_for_date_user(Owner, {RemoteBin, _, _} = Remote, DateTime) ->
 2213:     MicrosecDateTime = datetime_to_microseconds(DateTime),
 2214:     NowMicro = rpc_apply(mod_mam_utils, now_to_microseconds, [rpc_apply(erlang, now, [])]),
 2215:     Microsec = min(NowMicro, MicrosecDateTime),
 2216:     MsgIdOwner = rpc_apply(mod_mam_utils, encode_compact_uuid, [Microsec, random:uniform(20)]),
 2217:     MsgIdRemote = rpc_apply(mod_mam_utils, encode_compact_uuid, [Microsec+1, random:uniform(20)]),
 2218:     Packet = escalus_stanza:chat_to(RemoteBin, base16:encode(crypto:rand_bytes(4))),
 2219:     {{MsgIdOwner, MsgIdRemote}, Owner, Remote, Owner, Packet}.
 2220: 
 2221: random_time() ->
 2222:     MaxSecondsInDay = 86399,
 2223:     RandSeconds = random:uniform(MaxSecondsInDay),
 2224:     calendar:seconds_to_time(RandSeconds).
 2225: 
 2226: datetime_to_microseconds({{_,_,_}, {_,_,_}} = DateTime) ->
 2227:     S1 = calendar:datetime_to_gregorian_seconds(DateTime),
 2228:     S0 = calendar:datetime_to_gregorian_seconds({{1970, 1, 1}, {0, 0, 0}}),
 2229:     Seconds = S1 - S0,
 2230:     Seconds * 1000000.
 2231: 
 2232: 
 2233: put_msgs(Msgs) ->
 2234:     [put_msg(Msg) || Msg <- Msgs].
 2235: 
 2236: put_msg({{MsgIdOwner, MsgIdRemote},
 2237:          {_FromBin, FromJID, FromArcID},
 2238:          {_ToBin, ToJID, ToArcID},
 2239:          {_, Source, _}, Packet}) ->
 2240:     Host = escalus_ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain),
 2241:     archive_message([Host, MsgIdOwner, FromArcID, FromJID, ToJID, Source, outgoing, Packet]),
 2242:     archive_message([Host, MsgIdRemote, ToArcID, ToJID, FromJID, Source, incoming, Packet]).
 2243: 
 2244: archive_message(Args) ->
 2245:     rpc_apply(mod_mam, archive_message, Args).
 2246: 
 2247: 
 2248: 
 2249: muc_bootstrap_archive(Config) ->
 2250:     Room = ?config(room, Config),
 2251: 
 2252:     A = room_address(Room, nick(alice)),
 2253:     B = room_address(Room, nick(bob)),
 2254:     R = room_address(Room),
 2255: 
 2256:     Domain = muc_host(),
 2257:     Host = host(),
 2258:     RoomJid = make_jid(Room,Domain, <<>>),
 2259:     ArcJID = {R, RoomJid,
 2260:               rpc_apply(mod_mam_muc, archive_id, [Domain, Room])},
 2261:     Msgs = generate_msgs_for_days(ArcJID,
 2262:                                  [{B, make_jid(<<"bob">>, Host, <<"res1">>),
 2263:                                   rpc_apply(jid, replace_resource, [RoomJid, nick(bob)])},
 2264:                                   {A, make_jid(<<"alice">>, Host, <<"res1">>),
 2265:                                    rpc_apply(jid, replace_resource, [RoomJid, nick(alice)])}], 16),
 2266: 
 2267:     put_muc_msgs(Msgs),
 2268: 
 2269:     maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 2270: 
 2271:     [{pre_generated_muc_msgs, sort_msgs(Msgs)} | Config].
 2272: 
 2273: put_muc_msgs(Msgs) ->
 2274:     Host = host(),
 2275:     [archive_muc_msg(Host, Msg) || Msg <- Msgs].
 2276: 
 2277: archive_muc_msg(Host, {{MsgID, _},
 2278:                 {_RoomBin, RoomJID, RoomArcID},
 2279:                 {_FromBin, FromJID, SrcJID}, _, Packet}) ->
 2280:     rpc_apply(mod_mam_muc, archive_message, [Host, MsgID, RoomArcID, RoomJID,
 2281:                                              SrcJID, SrcJID, incoming, Packet]).
 2282: 
 2283: %% @doc Get a binary jid of the user, that tagged with `UserName' in the config.
 2284: nick_to_jid(UserName, Config) when is_atom(UserName) ->
 2285:     UserSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, UserName),
 2286:     escalus_utils:jid_to_lower(escalus_users:get_jid(Config, UserSpec)).
 2287: 
 2288: make_jid(U, S, R) ->
 2289:     rpc_apply(jid, make, [U, S, R]).
 2290: 
 2291: 
 2292: is_mam_possible(Host) ->
 2293:     is_odbc_enabled(Host) orelse is_riak_enabled(Host).
 2294: 
 2295: is_odbc_enabled(Host) ->
 2296:     case sql_transaction(Host, fun erlang:now/0) of
 2297:         {atomic, _} -> true;
 2298:         Other ->
 2299:             %ct:pal("ODBC disabled (check failed ~p)", [Other]),
 2300:             false
 2301:     end.
 2302: 
 2303: is_riak_enabled(_Host) ->
 2304:     case escalus_ejabberd:rpc(mongoose_riak, get_worker, []) of
 2305:         Pid when is_pid(Pid) ->
 2306:             true;
 2307:         _ ->
 2308:             false
 2309:     end.
 2310: 
 2311: sql_transaction(Host, F) ->
 2312:     escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_odbc, sql_transaction, [Host, F]).
 2313: 
 2314: login_send_presence(Config, User) ->
 2315:     Spec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, User),
 2316:     {ok, Client} = escalus_client:start(Config, Spec, <<"dummy">>),
 2317:     escalus:send(Client, escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>)),
 2318:     Client.
 2319: 
 2320: maybe_wait_for_yz(Config) ->
 2321:     case ?config(yz_wait, Config) of
 2322:         undefined ->
 2323:             ok;
 2324:         Value ->
 2325:             timer:sleep(Value)
 2326:     end.
 2327: 
 2328: 
 2329: %% Bob and Alice are friends.
 2330: %% Kate and Alice are not friends.
 2331: %%
 2332: %% Messages:
 2333: %% 1. Bob sends a message to Alice
 2334: %% 2. Alice sends a message to Bob
 2335: %% 3. Kate sends a message to Alice
 2336: %% 4. Alice sends a message to Kate
 2337: %%
 2338: %% Each tuple is
 2339: %% {{Default, Always, Never},
 2340: %%  [Message1Archived, Message2Archived, Message3Archied, Message4Archived]}
 2341: prefs_cases() ->
 2342:     [
 2343:      {{roster, [], []},              [true, true, false, false]},
 2344:      {{roster, [bob], []},           [true, true, false, false]},
 2345:      {{roster, [kate], []},          [true, true, true, true]},
 2346:      {{roster, [kate, bob], []},     [true, true, true, true]},
 2347:  
 2348:      {{roster, [], [bob]},           [false, false, false, false]},
 2349:      {{roster, [], [kate]},          [true, true, false, false]},
 2350:      {{roster, [], [bob, kate]},     [false, false, false, false]},
 2351:  
 2352:  
 2353:      {{never, [], []},              [false, false, false, false]},
 2354:      {{never, [bob], []},           [true, true, false, false]},
 2355:      {{never, [kate], []},          [false, false, true, true]},
 2356:      {{never, [kate, bob], []},     [true, true, true, true]},
 2357:  
 2358:      {{never, [], [bob]},           [false, false, false, false]},
 2359:      {{never, [], [kate]},          [false, false, false, false]},
 2360:      {{never, [], [bob, kate]},     [false, false, false, false]},
 2361:  
 2362:  
 2363:      {{always, [], []},              [true, true, true, true]},
 2364:      {{always, [bob], []},           [true, true, true, true]},
 2365:      {{always, [kate], []},          [true, true, true, true]},
 2366:      {{always, [kate, bob], []},     [true, true, true, true]},
 2367:  
 2368:      {{always, [], [bob]},           [false, false, true, true]},
 2369:      {{always, [], [kate]},          [true, true, false, false]},
 2370:      {{always, [], [bob, kate]},     [false, false, false, false]}
 2371:     ].
 2372: 
 2373: 
 2374: run_prefs_cases(Config) ->
 2375:     F = fun(Alice, Bob, Kate) ->
 2376:         make_alice_and_bob_friends(Alice, Bob),
 2377:         [run_prefs_case(Case, Alice, Bob, Kate, Config) || Case <- prefs_cases()]
 2378:         end,
 2379:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}, {kate, 1}], F).
 2380: 
 2381: make_alice_and_bob_friends(Alice, Bob) ->
 2382:         escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:presence_direct(escalus_client:short_jid(Bob), <<"subscribe">>)), 
 2383:         escalus_client:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:presence_direct(escalus_client:short_jid(Alice), <<"subscribe">>)), 
 2384:         escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:presence_direct(escalus_client:short_jid(Bob), <<"subscribed">>)), 
 2385:         escalus_client:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:presence_direct(escalus_client:short_jid(Alice), <<"subscribed">>)), 
 2386:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 7, 5000),
 2387:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 6, 5000),
 2388:         ok.
 2389: 
 2390: run_prefs_case({PrefsState, ExpectedMessageStates}, Alice, Bob, Kate, Config) ->
 2391:     IqSet = stanza_prefs_set_request(PrefsState, Config),
 2392:     escalus:send(Alice, IqSet),
 2393:     ReplySet = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 2394:     Messages = [iolist_to_binary(io_lib:format("~p", [now()])) || _ <- [1,2,3,4]],
 2395:     %% Messages:
 2396:     %% 1. Bob sends a message to Alice
 2397:     %% 2. Alice sends a message to Bob
 2398:     %% 3. Kate sends a message to Alice
 2399:     %% 4. Alice sends a message to Kate
 2400:     escalus:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, lists:nth(1, Messages))),
 2401:     escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, lists:nth(2, Messages))),
 2402:     escalus:send(Kate, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, lists:nth(3, Messages))),
 2403:     escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Kate, lists:nth(4, Messages))),
 2404:     escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1, 5000),
 2405:     escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Kate, 1, 5000),
 2406:     escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2, 5000),
 2407:     maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 2408:     %% Get last four archived texts
 2409:     Stanzas = get_last_four_messages(Alice),
 2410:     ParsedMessages = parse_messages(Stanzas),
 2411:     Bodies = [B || #forwarded_message{message_body=B} <- ParsedMessages],
 2412:     ActualMessageStates = [lists:member(M, Bodies) || M <- Messages],
 2413:     ?assert_equal_extra(ExpectedMessageStates, ActualMessageStates,
 2414:                         [{prefs_state, PrefsState}]),
 2415:     ok.
 2416: 
 2417: get_last_four_messages(Alice) ->
 2418:     RSM = #rsm_in{max=4, direction='before'},
 2419:     escalus:send(Alice, stanza_page_archive_request(<<"last4_rsm">>, RSM)),
 2420:     [_ArcIQ|AllMessages] = wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Alice),
 2421:     AllMessages.
 2422: 
 2423: stanza_prefs_set_request({DefaultMode, AlwaysUsers, NeverUsers}, Config) ->
 2424:     DefaultModeBin = atom_to_binary(DefaultMode, utf8),
 2425:     AlwaysJIDs = users_to_jids(AlwaysUsers, Config),
 2426:     NeverJIDs  = users_to_jids(NeverUsers, Config),
 2427:     stanza_prefs_set_request(DefaultModeBin, AlwaysJIDs, NeverJIDs).
 2428: 
 2429: users_to_jids(Users, Config) ->
 2430:     [escalus_users:get_jid(Config, User) || User <- Users].
